snippet: New York State postponed a requirement that developers provide offering plans on CD, but many are doing so anyway.
abstract: New York State postpones a requirement that developers provide offering plans in a digitized version to prospective buyers, but many are making them available as good business sense.
lead_paragraph: New York State postponed a requirement that developers provide offering plans on CD, but many are doing so anyway.

headline.main: Digitized Offering Plans Catch On With Developers
headline.print_headline: Digitized Offering Plans Catch On With Developers
